scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('You must use Yarn to install dependencies')"
scripts.start: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true webpack serve
scripts.start:visualizer: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true webpack serve
scripts.start:buildStats: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true webpack serve
scripts.start:visualizer:buildStats: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true webpack serve
scripts.build: yarn rm-dist && cross-env BE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true webpack

scripts.lint: yarn lint-js "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && yarn lint-css "**/*.{css,scss}" && yarn prettier .
scripts.lint:fix: yarn lint-js:fix "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && yarn lint-css:fix "**/*.{css,scss}" && yarn prettier:fix .
scripts.storybook:build:visualizer:buildStats: cross-env STORY_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook build
scripts.storybook:build:beta:visualizer:buildSta: cross-env STORY_ENV=beta INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook build
scripts.storybook:build:prod:visualizer:buildSta: cross-env STORY_ENV=production INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook build
